content: Benjamin, your writings are always on-time with what is going on in my life. It’s like you write for me alone :) Taking action is what I am doing now. I left my “paying the bills” job, to focus on my coaching full time. I know it will improve not only my life, but the lives of many others. It would be wrong for me not to do it. Many thanks, as always for your time spent writing (to me). ❤
